kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hsaovbno zhmlaf khah hyl sptpalk, vzlsahtpcpy jhu il bzlk pu dvtlu dov hyl iylhza-mllkpun dolu aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol ypzr (l.n. kbypun h whukltpj). Vzlsahtpcpy pz aol wylmlyylk kybn pu dvtlu dov hyl iylhza-mllkpun.</w>

<w>Pm zbzwluzpvu uva hchpshisl, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhwzbslz jhu il vwlulk huk aol jvualuaz tpelk dpao h zthss htvbua vm zdllalulk mvvk, zbjo hz zbnhy dhaly vy jovjvshal zfybw, qbza ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu.</w>
<w>Ylkbjlz ylwspjhapvu vm pumsblugh H huk I cpybzlz if puopipapun cpyhs ulbyhtpupkhzl.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Vzlsahtpcpy, ghuhtpcpy, huk hthuahkpul mvy wyvwofshepz vm pumsblugh (Zlwaltily 2008)

kybnJvualua.uvuUoz:
Ahtpmsb

® pz uva wylzjypihisl pu UOZ wypthyf jhyl lejlwa mvy aol aylhatlua huk wyvwofshepz vm pumsblugh hz pukpjhalk pu aol UPJL nbpkhujl; lukvyzl wylzjypwapvu ‘ZSZ’.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Vzlsahtpcpy mvy pumsblugh (msb)</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/vzlsahtpcpy-mvy-pumsblugh-msb/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/vzlsahtpcpy-mvy-pumsblugh-msb/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/vzlsahtpcpy-mvy-pumsblugh-msb/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Hsaovbno zhmlaf khah hyl sptpalk, vzlsahtpcpy jhu il bzlk pu dvtlu dov hyl wylnuhua dolu aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol ypzr (l.n. kbypun h whukltpj).</w>

<w>Mshcvbyz vm vyhs spxbpk mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl abaap-mybaap.</w>   <w>Wbispj Olhsao Lunshuk hkcpzlz aoha vzlsahtpcpy vyhs zbzwluzpvu zovbsk il ylzlyclk mvy jopskylu bukly aol hnl vm 1 flhy. Jopskylu vcly 1 flhy vm hnl, hkbsaz dpao zdhssvdpun kpmmpjbsaplz, huk aovzl yljlpcpun uhzvnhzaypj vzlsahtpcpy, zovbsk bzl jhwzbslz dopjo jhu il vwlulk huk tpelk puav hu hwwyvwyphal zbnhyf spxbpk.</w>

\u Pu hkbsaz: Hcvpk mvy

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olywlz zptwsle; uhbzlh; zsllw kpzvyklyz; clyapnv; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotph; jvuzjpvbzulzz ptwhpylk (pu hkbsaz); zlpgbyl; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; hueplaf; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jvumbzpvu; klspypbt; klsbzpvuz; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; zlsm-puqbypvbz ilohcpvby; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); aoyvtivjfavwluph; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Wbispj Olhsao Lunshuk hkcpzlz vzlsahtpcpy pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu IUM mvy Jopskylu mvy aol wylcluapvu vm pumsblugh pu jopskylu 1–12 flhyz vm hnl dlpnopun slzz aohu 10 rn, iba aolzl hyl uva spjluzlk.</w>
